text: Bigu ej Pajomʙar, ʙaroi inho musrikon: «Ojo az in sarikone, ki sumo ʙa Alloh sarik soxtaed, kase hast, ki ʙa haq roh namojad?» Bigu ʙarojason: «Alloh gumrohro ʙa haq roh menamojad. Ojo on Zote, ki ʙa haq roh menamojad ʙa pajravi sazovortar ast jo on kase, ki ʙa haq roh namejoʙad, magar in ki ʙa haq hidojat karda savad? Pas sumoro ci sudaast? ci guna hukm mekuned?»
